item.title: #walkaway
item.description: /c/#walkaway on lemmyunchained.net https://lemmyunchained.net/c/walkaway Description WalkAway showcases reasons why people are leaving the Left in droves. The Left is the ideology of the insane, lawless, immoral, and violent. Look no further than here to see why. This public forum is unaffiliated with the official WalkAway campaign. Walking away? Tell us your story and use the My #WalkAway Story text post flair. Details * Subscribers 3 Posts 1 Comments 0 Daily Active Users 1 Weekly Active Users 1 Monthly Active Users 1 Published 2023-06-16 05:51:07 Updated 2023-06-16 08:30:07 Last Scraped 2023-06-16 11:06:29

item.title: Debate Vaccines
item.description: /c/Debate Vaccines on lemmyunchained.net https://lemmyunchained.net/c/debatevaccines Description A reddit refuge for the r/debatevaccines subreddit. *Debate and discuss issues surrounding vaccinations.* **#DebateVaccines Rules:** **1. Post requirements:** Posts should be for good-faith discussion about vaccines and related policy issues. Posts with links must contain text summarizing the point the poster is attempting to make. Memes, off topic, treatment-related, vaccine injury, or posts that attempt to provoke rather than discuss will be removed, with particularly egregious violators subject to bans.
